Package com.prc.alp.liaison.adminGUI

Provides a GUI for administration of ALP/Cougaar liaisons with external agents through a JavaSpace-based interface.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AdminTreeCellRenderer AdminTreeCellRender is the renderer for cells in both tree displays.
AgentSocietySet An AgentSocietySet is an abstract class used to collect Liaison agent references, either ALPAgentReferences or ExternalAgentReferences.
AlpSocDisplayModelServer This class produces the Swing tree and list models needed to display ALP societies for the application.
AlpSocietyCollector The AlpSocietyCollector provides the functionality needed to bring an ALP Society into the Liason Admin Tool.
AlpSocietyDescriptor This class encapsulate all the knowledge needed to identify and retrieve a specific ALP society.
AlpSocietySet This class is a specialization of the AgentSociety set that is customized for representing ALP societies.
AlpSocListActionListener Action listener for the list of available ALP Societies.
AlpTreeSelectionListener Provides functionality for when a node on the alp display tree is loaded.
BooleanComboBoxModel This Class allows you to define a general purpose Combo Box model that supports toggling between two values that are represented by Strings that are passed in a creation time.
DelegatesActionListener Action Listener attached to the "Delegates Authority" Combo Box.
DisplayModelServer This is a base class for the Display Model Servers.
ExtJiniDiscoveryListener This class acts as a listener for discovering any new external agents that are registered with JINI.
ExtJiniSocietyCollector This class uses the JINI lookup service to import a society into the admin tool.
ExtJiniSocietyDescriptor This descriptor is encapsulates info needed find societies that us the JINI Lookup Service.
ExtSocDisplayModelServer This class prepares swing display models based on the external society currently loaded by the application.
ExtSocietyCollector This class is not be instantiated, but is an intermediate derivation between the base SocietyCollector class and all of the specific types of external society collectors.
ExtSocietyDescriptor This is a superclass for ExternalSociety Descriptors.
ExtSocietySet A derivation of AgentSocietySet that supports a set of External agent references.
ExtSocListActionListener This class provides the action for whenever the user wishes to load a new external society.
ExtTestSocietyCollector This society collector does not bring in live data, but rather canned data for testing.
ExtTreeSelectionListener Provides the "callback" activity when a node in the external society tree is selected.
IsEnabledActionListener Action listener for the IsEnabledComboBox.
LiaisonAdminToolController This class is the top level controller (or application shell ) for the Liaison Admin Tool.
LiaisonAdminToolMainGUI The class is the frame for the main window of the liaison AdminGui.
LiaisonSet This structure is a HashMap that is used to store a LiaisonStatusReference for each possible ALPAgent/ExternalAgent Pair created by the crossproduct between the AgentRefs in an ALP Society and and external society.
LiaisonSetCollector This class is responsible for pulling in the Liaison Status References for a given ALP Society and external society.
MasterExtSocietyCollector This class provides a very open-ended interface to a wide variety of External Societies.
MayInitActionListener Provides the functionality behind the "May Initialize Interactions" Combo Box on the permissions panel.
MayRespActionListener Provides the functionality for the May Respond to Interactions Combo Box on the permissions panel.
SocComboBoxModel Provides the Swing Combo Box model for the AlpSocietyListComboBox and the ExternalSocietyListComboBox.
SocietyCollector A Society Collector is used to import society descriptions into the AdminTool.
SocietyDescriptor A society descriptor is to contain all information needed to identify and retrieve a society with the appropriate collector.
 

Package com.prc.alp.liaison.adminGUI Description

Provides a GUI for administration of ALP/Cougaar liaisons with external agents through a JavaSpace-based interface.
